block.p: Leslie Brentano Haggin and Robert Howard Geary were married yesterday by the Rev. James L. Burns at the Episcopal Church of the Heavenly Rest in New York.

Mrs. Geary, 35, is a writer for Money magazine in New York and the author of ''Cut Your Spending the Lazy Way'' (Macmillan, 1999). She graduated from the University of California at Berkeley. She is a daughter of Theodora Crawford of Berkeley and Ben Ali Haggin of New York. Her father is an art dealer in New York, specializing in American paintings. Her mother is an editor of textbooks and other materials in Berkeley.

Mrs. Geary, 35, is a writer for Money magazine in New York and the author of ''Cut Your Spending the Lazy Way'' (Macmillan, 1999). She graduated from the University of California at Berkeley. She is a daughter of Theodora Crawford of Berkeley and Ben Ali Haggin of New York. Her father is an art dealer in New York, specializing in American paintings. Mr. Geary, 33, is a financial analyst in New York for Cablevision. He graduated from Franklin and Marshall College. He is a son of Mrs. James Otely McClellan of Hilton Head, S.C., and Dr. Paul Geary Jr., a thoracic and cardiovascular surgeon in Orlando, Fla. The bridegroom is a stepson of Lynn Geary and of James McClellan.
